div.span: Learning Online Every Day! Our buildings are CLOSED until at least May 1, 2020 - Check COVID-19 webpage for updates.

article.p: The Mission of the Kenston Local School District is for each student to achieve individual academic excellence and to maximize personal growth in a community which demonstrates and develops mutual respect, responsibility, and life-long learning.

div.p: Stay up to date with the latest Kenston District events.

img.alt: Kenston Local Schools | Bombers Fly Together!
